Class LevelFour

java.lang.Object
Level.LevelParent
Level.LevelFour
public class LevelFour extends LevelParent
The LevelFour class represents the fourth level of the game.

This level is characterized by a specific background image, a set number of kills required to advance, and specific enemy units (Boss and Boss2). The game logic in this level includes checking if the game is over and spawning enemies when necessary.

Source Code: GitHub Link

    • LevelFour

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • checkIfGameOver

      protected void checkIfGameOver()
      Check if the game is over based on the player's status and enemy statuses. Sets the game to a loss if the player is destroyed, and to a win if both bosses are destroyed.
      Specified by:
      checkIfGameOver in class LevelParent

    • initializeFriendlyUnits

      protected void initializeFriendlyUnits()
      Initialize the friendly units (player) for this level. Adds the player unit to the root of the level.
      Specified by:
      initializeFriendlyUnits in class LevelParent

    • spawnEnemyUnits

      protected void spawnEnemyUnits()
      Spawn the enemy units for this level. Adds the Boss and Boss2 units to the level when no enemies are currently present.
      Specified by:
      spawnEnemyUnits in class LevelParent

    • instantiateLevelView

      protected LevelView instantiateLevelView()
      Instantiate the view for the level. Sets up the visual representation of the level, including player health and game elements.
      Specified by:
      instantiateLevelView in class LevelParent
      Returns:
      A new instance of `LevelView` for this level.
